publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1404.2 Iain Gray: District Courts-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1404) in the name of Phil Gallie, leave out from "and calls" to end and insert "; recognises that the Crown has worked to protect business in District Courts and that this has proved successful except in the case of Glasgow, and urges the suspension of further action affecting the courts." Supported by: Ben Wallace*
